column1: The Purple Pig////We ordered the bone marrow
column2: lamb ribs and half duck. The bone marrow just melts in your mouth and goes perfect with the bread and arugula
column3: but it was a bit salty. The lamb ribs come right off of the bone
column4: but was a tad too sweet
column5: so the yogurt on the side helped to bring down the sweetness. Finally
column6: the half duck is a lot of meat! There were some parts of the duck that were a little too dry
column7: and it isn't like Chinese Peking duck. You need that bread to go with it.
